section.title: User roles
section.para: Every user is assigned a role, which controls access to Symantec Security Cloud. End users can enroll their own devices, but only administrators and account administrators can monitor and manage the overall security of the company environment.
Roles are assigned when you create new users and cannot be changed later. The company account administrator can assign any role, but an administrator can only assign the user role.

listitem.para: Users can enroll their own personal and company-owned devices. When end users sign in to Symantec Security Cloud, they are taken to a simplified webpage to manage their devices.
Administrators can manage users, devices, and policies.
Account administrators can manage users, devices, and policies. They can also manage subscriptions to Symantec Security Cloud and create other administrators.

note.para: An account administrator is created when the company account is created. As a best practice, we recommend creating a second account administrator to ensure management continuity.
